actions.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment clarifies that the Global Diversity and Urban Export Initiative will focus on businesses that, because of their minority ownership, may have been excluded from export trade.
purpose: An amendment no. 4 printed in the Congressional Record. to clarify that the Global Diversity and Urban Export Initiative will focus on businesses that, because of their minority ownership, may have been excluded from export trade.
